Package controllers

Interface EnquiryControlInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
EnquiryController
public interface EnquiryControlInterface
Represents the EnquiryControlInterface to be implemented by EnquiryController
Since:
2021-11-24
Version:
1.1
Author:
Teo Xuan Ming

  • Method Details

    • add

      int add(String enquiry)
      Add an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiry - the enquiry text to be added
      Returns:
      the enquiry id if successful, -1 if not

    • edit

      int edit(int enquiryid, String enquiry) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Edit an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be edited
      enquiry - the new enquiry text
      Returns:
      the enquiry id if successful, -1 if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if enquiry cannot be found

    • get

      String get(int enquiryid)
      Get an enquiry text based on enquiry id
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the enquiry text if successful, null if not

    • finalise

      Boolean finalise(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Finalise an enquiry by setting the seen attribute to true so that enquiry can be replied to
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be finalised
      Returns:
      true if successful, controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if enquiry cannot be found

    • isEditable

      Boolean isEditable(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Check if an enquiry is editable If an enquiry has been finalised, (i.e.seen attribute is true), it is not editable
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be checked
      Returns:
      true if editable, throws controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if enquiry cannot be found

    • saveReply

      int saveReply(int enquiryid, String reply) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Save a reply to an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be replied to
      reply - the reply text
      Returns:
      the enquiry id if successful, -1 if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if enquiry cannot be found

    • getReplies

      ArrayList<String> getReplies(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Get the replies to an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the replies to an enquiry if successful, controller item missing
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if enquiry cannot be found

    • delete

      Boolean delete(int enquiryid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Delete an enquiry
      Parameters:
      enquiryid - the enquiry id to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if successful, controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if enquiry cannot be found
